page.title: 12Milne Park Fair
page.content: The New Addington fair took place on the Milne Park green, the carnival started at Vulcan Way,The route took them down King Henrys drive,up Park Way,along the Central Parade, up Homstead way into the field.The weather wasn't what it was hoped to be, everything went well though, except it was too windy for the parachute jump.The carnival floats were very colourful but the procession did not last as long as last year.There were a lot of rides at the fair including:The big wheel,Rock a planes, chair o planes, The Tahite Express. The whip,the Helter Skelter, The octopus and the scrambler twist. There were also many side shows and a good time was had by one and all.
